discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
【たぶん】
C. cloud region

Selected Answer: C
C is correct, I verified that in the Prisma Cloud Enterprise console.

questions.question_text: Which filter type is valid in Asset Explorer?

choices.B: event from cloud.audit_logs where cloud.service = 'Google Bigquery Dataset'
choices.A: event from cloud.audit_logs where cloud.type = 'gcp' AND cloud.service = 'Google Bigtable Instance'
choices.C: event from cloud.audit_logs where cloud.type = 'gcp' AND cloud.service = 'bigquery.googleapis.com'

questions.question_text: Which RQL query should be used to quickly identify any events related to an organization's Google Cloud Platform Big Guery database the in last 24 hours?
What are two benefits of Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) over other solutions? (Choose two.)

choices.A: guaranteed proof of concept (РОС) extensions beyond 30 days
choices.B: native integration of network, endpoint, and cloud data to stop attacks

choices.C: Manually create the Resource Query Language (RQL) statement.
choices.D: Override the value and commit the configuration.
choices.B: Click the gear icon next to the policy name to open the "Edit Policy" dialog.
choices.A: Clone the existing policy and change the value.

questions.question_text: How can a range of dates in the Prisma Cloud default policy be modified?
How can all alerts related to "Amazon RDS" be quickly identified within the Prisma Cloud dashboard?

choices.A: Generate a Center for Internet Security (CIS) compliance report and search for "Amazon RDS" policy violations
choices.C: Within the "Alerts" tab, filter on "Amazon RDS" as a service
choices.D: Create a custom Resource Query Language (RQL) configuration report
choices.B: View the alert data on the "Asset Inventory" dashboard and filter on "Amazon RDS."
